thread.title: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales
thread.title_full: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales

title: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales
text:
Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales   24, 2015 at 8:02 AM   24, 2015 at 10:02 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (AP) â€” Sotheby's auction house in New York is showing off the huge art collection amassed by its late owner. 
A. Alfred Taubman had a 500-piece collection spanning every period, genre and medium. The collection will be auctioned over four dedicated sales, three in November and one in January. 
In advance of those sales, Sotheby's has transformed its building inside and out to give a real sense of its depth and scope. Three hundred of the works fill the lobby and the entire 10th floor of the building. The dedicated exhibition runs for four days only, from Saturday through Tuesday. 
The auctions are estimated to bring more than $500 million. If they do, it would be the most valuable private collection ever sold at auction.
